title: Game Crashing For No Reason
body: Around the start of this week every few games my client crashes and says "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again" or something like that even thought im connected to the internet with good connection its happened about 3 times today and maybe 8 times this week. I'm not sure what the problem is or how to fix it.

replies.body: Though you might have a good connection, you can still run into problems reach specific services.  For your specific issue, your network could be having issues successfully reaching the game servers.  I recommend going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, making sure to go over each step to rule out possibilities.  Let me know if you have any questions!

The same thing's been happening to me today. Every game I play, the loading screen crashes and I have to completely restart the client. This means I can't get into the game until 1-2 minutes in, sometimes 5 minutes in because it crashes after I restart it too.
